1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The screen between the Jinn and the nakedness of the sons of Adam is that when a person enters the Kanif, he should say: Bismillah (in the name of Allah)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ الرَّجُلُ إِذَا دَخَلَ الْخَلاَءَ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be said when entering the toilet
